TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RegisteredWaitHandle extends System.MarshalByRefObject
Public NotInheritable Class RegisteredWaitHandle Inherits MarshalByRefObject
public ref class RegisteredWaitHandle sealed : MarshalByRefObject

summary.span: 代表呼叫 時已經登錄的控制代碼。

span.span: Represents a handle that has been registered when calling .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用判斷為什麼呼叫的回呼方法，以及如何取消登錄回呼就會發生等候控制代碼已收到信號的工作。The following example shows how to use a to determine why a callback method is called, and how to unregister a task if the callback occurred because the wait handle was signaled. 此範例也示範如何使用方法來指定的等候控制代碼會收到信號時，執行指定的回呼方法。The example also shows how to use the method to execute a specified callback method when a specified wait handle is signaled. 在此範例中，回呼方法是`WaitProc`，等候控制代碼，且。In this example, the callback method is `WaitProc`, and the wait handle is an . 此範例會定義`TaskInfo`類別以包裝在執行時傳遞至回呼的資訊。The example defines a `TaskInfo` class to hold the information that is passed to the callback when it executes. 此範例會建立`TaskInfo`物件，並將其指派一些字串資料。The example creates a `TaskInfo` object and assigns it some string data. 所傳回方法指派給`Handle`欄位`TaskInfo`物件，使回呼方法具有存取權。The that is returned by the method is assigned to the `Handle` field of the `TaskInfo` object so that the callback method has access to the . 除了指定`TaskInfo`做為傳遞至回呼方法，呼叫物件方法指定等候工作，委派，表示`WaitProc`回呼方法一個第二個逾時間隔及多個回呼。In addition to specifying `TaskInfo` as the object to pass to the callback method, the call to the method specifies the that the task will wait for, a delegate that represents the `WaitProc` callback method, a one second time-out interval, and multiple callbacks. 當主執行緒發出的訊號藉由呼叫其方法，叫用委派。When the main thread signals the by calling its method, the delegate is invoked. `WaitProc`方法測試來判斷是否發生逾時。The `WaitProc` method tests to determine whether a time-out occurred. 如果回呼已叫用，因為已收到信號，等候控制代碼，`WaitProc`方法會移除註冊，停止其他的回呼。If the callback was invoked because the wait handle was signaled, the `WaitProc` method unregisters the , stopping additional callbacks. 在逾時，工作會繼續等候。In the case of a time-out, the task continues to wait. `WaitProc`方法結束列印訊息至主控台。The `WaitProc` method ends by printing a message to the console. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.ThreadPool RegisterWaitForSingleObject0#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadPool RegisterWaitForSingleObject0/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.ThreadPool RegisterWaitForSingleObject0#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadPool RegisterWaitForSingleObject0/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.ThreadPool RegisterWaitForSingleObject0#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.ThreadPool RegisterWaitForSingleObject0/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此型別具備執行緒安全。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Unregister(class System.Threading.WaitHandle waitObject) cil managed
Public Function Unregister (waitObject As WaitHandle) As Boolean

summary.span: 將 方法所發出之已登錄等候作業取消。

span.span: Cancels a registered wait operation issued by the method.

returns.span: 如果函式成功，則為 ，否則為 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`waitObject`指定時，才收到信號已成功取消註冊。If `waitObject` is specified, it is signaled only if the is successfully unregistered. 如果正在進行中的回呼方法時執行，`waitObject`回呼方法完成之前未收到信號。If a callback method is in progress when executes, `waitObject` is not signaled until the callback method completes. 特別是，如果回呼方法都執行，`waitObject`該回呼方法完成之前未收到信號。In particular, if a callback method executes , `waitObject` is not signaled until that callback method completes. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用方法來取消登錄回呼就會發生等候控制代碼已收到信號的工作。The following example shows how to use the method to unregister a task if a callback occurred because the wait handle was signaled. 此範例也示範如何使用方法來指定的等候控制代碼會收到信號時，執行指定的回呼方法。The example also shows how to use the method to execute a specified callback method when a specified wait handle is signaled. 在此範例中，回呼方法是`WaitProc`，等候控制代碼，且。In this example, the callback method is `WaitProc`, and the wait handle is an . 此範例會定義`TaskInfo`類別以包裝在執行時傳遞至回呼的資訊。The example defines a `TaskInfo` class to hold the information that is passed to the callback when it executes. 此範例會建立`TaskInfo`物件，並將其指派一些字串資料。The example creates a `TaskInfo` object and assigns it some string data. 所傳回方法指派給`Handle`欄位`TaskInfo`物件，使回呼方法具有存取權。The that is returned by the method is assigned to the `Handle` field of the `TaskInfo` object so that the callback method has access to the . 除了指定`TaskInfo`做為傳遞至回呼方法，呼叫物件方法指定等候工作，委派，表示`WaitProc`回呼方法一個第二個逾時間隔及多個回呼。In addition to specifying `TaskInfo` as the object to pass to the callback method, the call to the method specifies the that the task will wait for, a delegate that represents the `WaitProc` callback method, a one second time-out interval, and multiple callbacks. 當主執行緒發出的訊號藉由呼叫其方法，叫用委派。When the main thread signals the by calling its method, the delegate is invoked. `WaitProc`方法測試來判斷是否發生逾時。The `WaitProc` method tests to determine whether a time-out occurred. 如果回呼已叫用，因為已收到信號，等候控制代碼，`WaitProc`方法會移除註冊，停止其他的回呼。If the callback was invoked because the wait handle was signaled, the `WaitProc` method unregisters the , stopping additional callbacks. 在逾時，工作會繼續等候。In the case of a time-out, the task continues to wait. `WaitProc`方法結束列印訊息至主控台。The `WaitProc` method ends by printing a message to the console.
